maintext:
Gregg Allman‘s family, associates and musical collaborators will honor the late Allman Brothers Band singer with a trio of live celebrations timed around the September 8th release of his final live LP,
This article originally appeared on www.rollingstone.com: Gregg Allman Tribute Events Planned Around Final LP, ‘Southern Blood’
…read more
Via:: Rolling Stone
title: Gregg Allman Tribute Events Planned Around Final LP, 'Southern Blood'
